Package com.platform.user.internal

Interface InvitationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Invitation,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Invitation,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Invitation,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Invitation,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Invitation,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Invitation>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Invitation,UUID>
@Repository public interface InvitationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Invitation,UUID>
Repository interface for Invitation entity operations.

    • findExpiredInvitations

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invitation i WHERE i.expiresAt < :now AND i.status = \'PENDING\'") List<Invitation> findExpiredInvitations(@Param("now") Instant now)
      Find expired invitations

    • existsActiveInvitation

      @Query("SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(i) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM Invitation i WHERE i.email = :email AND i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.status = \'PENDING\' AND i.expiresAt > :now") boolean existsActiveInvitation(@Param("email") String email, @Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Check if active invitation exists for email and organization

    • countByOrganizationIdAndStatus

      long countByOrganizationIdAndStatus(UUID organizationId, Invitation.Status status)
      Count pending invitations for organization

    • findInvitationsExpiringSoon

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invitation i WHERE i.expiresAt BETWEEN :now AND :warningTime AND i.status = \'PENDING\'") List<Invitation> findInvitationsExpiringSoon(@Param("now") Instant now, @Param("warningTime") Instant warningTime)
      Find invitations expiring soon

    • deleteExpiredInvitations

      @Query("DELETE FROM Invitation i WHERE i.expiresAt < :cutoffTime") void deleteExpiredInvitations(@Param("cutoffTime") Instant cutoffTime)
      Delete expired invitations

    • findByStatus

      List<Invitation> findByStatus(Invitation.Status status)
      Find invitations by status

    • findRecentInvitations

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invitation i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.createdAt >= :since ORDER BY i.createdAt DESC") List<Invitation> findRecentInvitations(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("since") Instant since)
      Find recent invitations for organization

    • findPendingInvitation

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invitation i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.email = :email AND i.status = \'PENDING\' AND i.expiresAt > :now") Optional<Invitation> findPendingInvitation(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("email") String email, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Find pending invitation for organization and email

    • findPendingInvitation

      default Optional<Invitation> findPendingInvitation(UUID organizationId, String email)
      Find pending invitation without time check (for service method compatibility)

    • findByTokenAndStatus

      Optional<Invitation> findByTokenAndStatus(String token, Invitation.Status status)
      Find invitation by token and status

    • findPendingInvitationsForOrganization

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invitation i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.status = \'PENDING\' ORDER BY i.createdAt DESC") List<Invitation> findPendingInvitationsForOrganization(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)
      Find pending invitations for organization
